name: Araka~JK Exorcist Horror RPG
description:
"Araka~JK Exorcist Horror RPG" is a horror exploration RPG developed by 「I'm moralist」and published by BokiBoki Games!
Manipulate the main character with power of telepathic, looking for the trace of Araka, an Exorcist imprisoned in the other world.
+

■ Story


The other world, which was supposed to be investigated by the Exorcist Association, is a very cruel world for female exorcists.
It is so powerful that it would take five experienced male exorcists to seal it away.
The exorcist girl Araka was trapped in such a bad world.

「I won't lose!」

Nevertheless, for the sake of her love ones, Araka did not give up
However, in this evil world that tries to deprive people of their dignity, can Araka, who fought alone, redeem herself?

Araka has been missing for two months.
For you who have little experience in exorcism, the only thing you can rely on is your unique natural psychic powers.
Can you save Araka from this vicious world?

DLsite AWARD 2021「Excellent Story」Winner

▶The main scene of the heroine is fully voiced and immersive! BGV is also included!
▶Estimated play time: 4 to 6 hours

■ Game Features

  • Classic exploration RPG gameplay
  • Gather information on the map
  • Horror scene skip function
